messages.message:
Network engineer - Tucson, AZ

Dear Brian, 

Hope you are doing well 
We have an excellent opportunity for a Network Engineer/ Admin with one of our leading clients in AZ
Kindly let me know if you are open for any new opportunities. 

Job Description:

•	8- 12 years’ experience in the troubleshooting and performance management of data infrastructure networks
•	Expert level knowledge in at least TWO of the following and strong knowledge in all other areas of: Cisco Routers, Switches, Cisco Wireless Access Point, WLC, Cisco WAAS, Cisco WAN Accelerators and Optimizers.
•	Expertise on latest Cisco hardware and operating systems
•	Knowledgeable in the data circuit technologies - TDM, MPLS, Ethernet, EoSDH and POS

Vinesh Babu
vinesh.babu@cognizant.com
Desk: 973-368-9700 Ext: 440182
